# include<bits/stdc++.h>
# define LL long long int
# define scan(i) scanf("%lld",&i)

using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
	LL T;
	for(scan(T);T--;)
	{
		char start[6] , str[101];
		scanf("%s%s",start,str);
		int mark[150] = {0},car=0;
		for (int i=0;i<strlen(str);i++)
			mark[str[i]]++;
		LL ans = 0;
		for (int i='a';i<='z';i++)
		{
			if (mark[i])
				car++;
			ans ^= mark[i];	
		}
		if (car==1)
		{
			printf("%s\n",start);
			continue;
		}
		if (start[0]=='V')
		{
			if(ans)
				printf("Varun\n");
			else
				printf("Tarun\n");
		}
		else
		{
			if (ans)
				printf("Tarun\n");
			else
				printf("Varun\n");
		}
	}
	return (0);
}
